text: Issey pehle Yusuf tumhare paas bayyinat lekar aaye thay magar tum unki layi hui taleem ki taraf se shakk hi mein paday rahey. Phir jab unka inteqal ho gaya to tumne kaha ab unke baad Allah koi Rasool hargiz na bhejega.â€ Isi taraah Allah un sab logon ko gumraahi mein daal deta hai jo hadd se guzarne waale aur shakki(doubting) hotey hain
